CustomField.description: E2B (R2): NA E2B (R3): F.r.3.1 Test Result (code) User Guidance: This data element allows a descriptive code to indicate the test result. Conformance: Optional, but required if F.r.2 is populated, and F.r.3.2 and F.r.3.4 is not populated. Data Type: 1N OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.989.2.1.1.12 Value Allowed: 1=Positive 2=Negative 3=Borderline 4=Inconclusive
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User Guidance: This data element allows a descriptive code to indicate the test result.
CustomField.label: Test Result Code
